Stixbox Function

NAME

    qgamma - The gamma inverse distribution function

CALLING SEQUENCE

x = qgamma(p,a [,s])

PARAMETERS

    • p : probability
    • a,s : positive real, parameter of the gamma distribution (a and scale can be scalar or matrix with common size with p). scale is optional, default value is 1.
    • x : inverse of the gamma cumulative distribution function of parameter a at p

DESCRIPTION

    The gamma inverse distribution function. The gamma distribution is: 

          s^(a)/Gamma(a) * X^(a-1) * exp(- s*X)
